name: CyberFrog Shop
description: CyberFrog Shop is an ecommerce website I built for All CAPS Comics. It features a Home page with a slideshow for recent promotions of campaigns and products, a Store page where users can browse and purchase products listed by the owner, and a Campaign page where the owner can add campaigns.

name: Ocean Driven
description: Ocean Driven is boat booking website that I built with a team of 3 other developers. It was inspired by a team members friend who owns a yacht rental service and needed a website to run his business on. It's like Airbnb for boats!

name: Spoon-Fed Reviews
description: Spoon-Fed Reviews is a social media website built around posting and commenting on food recipes. I built it with 2 other developers as a class project.
